TABLE.NAME: tool_coursestore
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps details of the backups that have been sent and their status.

FIELD.NAME: fileid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key into the files table.

FIELD.NAME: chunksize
FIELD.COMMENT: How big the pieces of the file will be broken into.

FIELD.NAME: totalchunks
FIELD.COMMENT: How many chuncks will get sent.

FIELD.NAME: chunknumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Which chunck is currently getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this entire backup started to get sent.

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this entire backup completed getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: timechunksent
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this current chunck was started to get sent.

FIELD.NAME: timechunkcompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this current chunck was completed getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of sending this backup.

INDEX.NAME: uq_fileid
INDEX.COMMENT: The linked file id into the files table.

INDEX.NAME: ix_filedata
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to easily retrieve the backup file details.
